name: DataBC Application Feeds Service
tagline: Stay up to date with changes, updates, planned outages for DataBC Applications and Services
body:
About this service
This system is used to publish RSS/ATOM feeds about events such as new releases and planned outages about DataBC applications and services. These feeds are created for publishing within our website and through applications that we host at this same domain.

You can directly subscribe to the feeds as a general collection (* or  *) .

You can also subcribe by topic category (e.g. Outages, Maintenance, â€¦)  by appending /topics/[name]?feed=[feedtype] to the base URL(*. For example to subscribe to feeds about updates to our geocoding services add the following link to your RSS reader.(* ).

Topic names for individual feed channels appear in brackets next to the category name on the right.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
